attributes.action: Improve social integration for young individuals Leaving reality shows
attributes.additional_details: The feeling of inadequacy and overwhelming attention having left these shows proves there is little support for those who are going back into society having experienced a significant increase and intrusiveness in their personal lives. People can’t cope and End up living lives that aren’t maintainable. Sociable media has a part to play but responsibility lies with the tv shows.
attributes.background: There are far too many individuals suffering from mental health problems having left a reality tv shows. Some of whom, who go on to commit suicide. More needs to be done from producers and broadcasters to help reduce these numbers.

rejection.details: This petition seems to be calling on the producers and broadcasters of reality shows, not the UK Government or Parliament, to take action.
